Greetings,
I had scheduled an appointment for my parents and grandfather in Goregaon,
Mumbai 400104, between 10 am and 12:00 pm today (14.12.2025, Sunday).

The tests were completed for both my parents; the ECG machine wasn't
brought over for my grandfather, and hence, those tests weren't completed.
The phlebotomist said that there were some issues with the original
phlebotomist who was supposed to show, and asked me to file a complaint for
a refund or a reschedule (I would prefer a reschedule, please).

I don't live in India, so I cannot connect over a call. I am attaching
details for your reference.

Tests were booked for:
- Asha Kamlesh Dubey - Women's Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis
Screening
- Kamlesh Gayaram Dubey - Men's Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis
Screening
- Gayaram Dubey - Comprehensive Full Body Checkup with Vitamins and ECG
- My phone number linked to the account - +91 8828464425

Looking forward to a speedy resolution.

Warm Regards,
Devesh Dubey

The tests were completed for both my parents; the ECG machine wasn't brought over for my grandfather, and hence, those tests weren't completed. The phlebotomist said that there were some issues with the original phlebotomist who was supposed to show, and asked me to file a complaint for a refund or a reschedule (I would prefer a reschedule, please). 

I don't live in India, so I cannot connect over a call. I am attaching details for your reference.

Tests were booked for: 
- Asha Kamlesh Dubey - Women's Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis Screening
- Kamlesh Gayaram Dubey - Men's Master Checkup with Cancer & Arthritis Screening
- Gayaram Dubey - Comprehensive Full Body Checkup with Vitamins and ECG
- My phone number linked to the account - +91 8828464425

Looking forward to a speedy resolution.

Warm Regards,
Devesh Dubey

notes.body: Hello Priya,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regards to your order #656664118916091904-15169, I can see a return request has already been raised for the wrong product on 15th December 2025. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.   Please be informed, items that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.   The medicines will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 working days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payment source within 5 - 7 business days.   I appreciate your patience in the meantime.        For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.   Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Priya,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regards to your order #656664118916091904-15169, I can see a return request has already been raised for the wrong product on 15th December 2025. Please accept my sincere apologies for the inconvenience caused.

Please be informed, items that are opened, partially used, or disfigured are not eligible for returns. Items being returned should be in their original manufacturer’s packaging with labels and barcode intact.

The medicines will be collected within 48 hours from the day the request is raised. Once the medicine is returned, it will be verified by our partner retailer at the store. The refund will be processed and initiated within 5 working days. Also, once the refund is initiated it would reflect in your payment source within 5 - 7 business days.

I appreciate your patience in the meantime.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello Ram,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     ​I understand your concern regarding the old prescription deletion. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.  Please be informed that to keep a medical history of the patient, we are unable to remove/delete the prescription from our records. In addition, we require a valid prescription in the form of JPEG or PDF format in order as we do not accept prescriptions via Video.     I sincerely appreciate your understanding in this matter.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!     Regards,     Habiba
notes.body_html:
Hello Ram,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

​I understand your concern regarding the old prescription deletion. I apologise for the inconvenience caused to you.

Please be informed that to keep a medical history of the patient, we are unable to remove/delete the prescription from our records. In addition, we require a valid prescription in the form of JPEG or PDF format in order as we do not accept prescriptions via Video.

I sincerely appreciate your understanding in this matter.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the Need Help section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay healthy!

Regards,
Habiba

notes.body: Hello ​Ram niwas,     Greetings from PharmEasy!  ​   I am sorry to inform you that your order #657420582953750528-55162 was cancelled due to the medicine that you added were unavailable with our Partner Retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you.   ​   The refund amount of Rs. 887.83 was initiated on 10th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (534402645310).   Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.   I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restock the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.  ​   For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.     Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Manisha
notes.body_html:
Hello ​Ram niwas,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
​
I am sorry to inform you that your order #657420582953750528-55162 was cancelled due to the medicine that you added were unavailable with our Partner Retailer. I am sorry for the inconvenience caused to you. 
​
The refund amount of Rs. 887.83 was initiated on 10th December 2025, and it will be reflected in your payment source account within 5 to 7 business days (Excluding Saturday, Sunday & Bank Holidays). Request you to check with your bank's customer care with the help of the ARN number (534402645310).

Please note, at the time of placing the order the requested medicine was available in limited quantity and you were able to add medicines in the order. Once the medicine was added to your order our Partner Retailer tried to arrange the medicine from every possible source. However, they could not arrange one. I apologize that we were unable to fulfill your medicine requirements for this order completely.

I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restock the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request you to reach us out. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.
​
For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Manisha

notes.body: Hello Rahul,        Greetings from PharmEasy!     I understand your concern regarding the order #658726866154774528-60203. As per the records, your order was canceled on 14th December 2025. I apologize for any inconvenience caused to you with your order.  ​   I see the requested medicine GELUSIL MPS ORIGINAL MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 400ML LIQUID was unavailable with our partner retailer. Hence, it was replaced with GELUSIL MPS ORIGINAL MINT FLAVOUR SUGAR FREE BOTTLE OF 200ML LIQUID as a packaging variant to fulfill your requirements.   I assure you that this change in your order has occurred only if the Partner Retailer has exhausted all possible alternatives to source the unavailable medicine.  ​   I request you to place a new order after 7 days for the required medicine. As our retailer restocks the medicines every 7 days. If the medicine is still unavailable, I would request that you reach out to us. We will highlight your concern to the Partner retailer.     I see the refund of Rs. 1823.74 was initiated on 14th December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days from the date of initiation. I see the refund of Rs. 1823.74 was initiated on 14th December 2025. It will be credited to your original payment source within 5 to 7 working days from the date of initiation. You can track your refund via ARN number: P04-8634547-3144721-R003930.

I hope this message finds you well. My name is Subhronil Chattoraj, and I’m the Operational Manager of the Technical Team at SIES Graduate School of Technology. We are excited to announce that we will be organizing the 9th edition of ByteCamp’26, which will take place in March 2026.

ByteCamp’26 will be Navi Mumbai’s biggest non-profit, student-organized hackathon. We will be hosting students from all over India in a 24-hour hackathon, where they will compete to innovate, develop, and present the best solutions to real-world problem statements.

In this edition of ByteCamp’26, we are expecting a footfall of 2000+ participants, along with industry experts for mentorship and judging.

By partnering with us, you will have the opportunity to:

Showcase Your Brand: Gain visibility among a diverse audience passionate about technology.

Promote Your Initiatives: Share your company’s latest products, services, and career opportunities through various platforms during the event.

Social Media Exposure: Benefit from our social media campaigns leading up to and during the event, ensuring your brand reaches a wider audience across multiple platforms.

Problem Statement Integration: We’d be excited to collaborate and can feature a problem statement aligned with your company’s interests within our hackathon tracks.


We would be thrilled to discuss how we can tailor a sponsorship package to meet your needs. We believe that a partnership with you will significantly enhance the experience of our participants while providing valuable exposure for your brand.

If you’re interested, please let me know, and I’ll be happy to share more details.

Anticipating your response.

Best regards,
Subhronil Chattoraj
Operational Manager
Technical Team
SIES Graduate School of Technology, Navi Mumbai

I am writing to formally raise a grievance regarding my prepaid order
placed on your platform, which has been subjected to continuous and
unreasonable delays well beyond any acceptable delivery timeline.


Order Details:


   -

   Order ID: 645157174067867648-77797-MEB
   -

   Courier Partner: Shiprocket
   -

   Tracking ID: 34791152184240
   -

postponing the delivery date (from 4 Dec → 6 Dec → 8 Dec → 10 Dec → 12 Dec
→ 14 Dec → now 16 Dec). Despite these assurances, the shipment status shows
no meaningful progress, and remarks such as “Not Picked – Shipment not
received from client” clearly indicate operational issues at your end.


This delay is far beyond a reasonable time period, especially for a
healthcare-related order. What is even more concerning is that there is no
option available to cancel the order on the app despite the failure to
deliver, which is unacceptable and unfair to the customer.


At this point, I no longer wish to receive the delivery. Due to the

cancellation support, I am requesting the following:

Please treat this matter as urgent and confirm the refund initiation along
with the expected timeline. If this issue is not resolved promptly, I will
be compelled to escalate the matter to the appropriate consumer grievance
forums.


I expect a prompt and satisfactory resolution.


Regards,
